member.name: M:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.ProcessCmdKey(System.Windows.Forms.Message@,System.Windows.Forms.Keys)

summary.vsli:raw: Processes a command key, ensuring that the hosted element has an opportunity to handle the command before normal Windows Forms processing.

member.summary: 处理命令键，确保承载的元素在进行正常的 Windows 窗体处理之前有机会处理命令。

param.name: msg
param.vsli:raw: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Message" />, passed by reference, that represents the window message to process.

member.param: 通过引用传递的 ，表示要处理的窗口消息。

param.name: keyData
param.vsli:raw: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Keys" /> values representing the key to process.

member.param: 值之一，表示要处理的键。

returns.vsli:raw: <see langword="true" /> if the character is a Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) shortcut key; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.

member.returns: 如果该字符是 Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) 快捷键，则为 ；否则为 。

member.name: M:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.ProcessMnemonic(System.Char)

summary.vsli:raw: Processes a mnemonic character, ensuring that the hosted element has an opportunity to handle the mnemonic before normal Windows Forms processing.

member.summary: 处理助记键字符，从而确保承载的元素在进行正常的 Windows 窗体处理之前有机会处理助记键。

param.name: charCode
param.vsli:raw: The character to process.

returns.vsli:raw: <see langword="true" /> if the character is a Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) shortcut key; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.

member.returns: 如果该字符是 Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) 快捷键，则为 ；否则为 。

member.returns: 一个 ，它将 映射到所承载 WPF 元素的属性。

summary.vsli:raw: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.PropertyMap" /> class.

member.summary: 用给定的源对象初始化 类的一个新实例。

param.name: source
param.vsli:raw: The object which has the properties to be translated.

member.param: 具有要进行转换的属性的对象。

member.name: M:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.PropertyMap.Add(System.String,System.Windows.Forms.Integration.PropertyTranslator)

summary.vsli:raw: Adds a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.PropertyTranslator" /> delegate for the given property to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.PropertyMap" />.

param.vsli:raw: The name of the property to map.

member.param: 在 更改时调用的 委托。

member.name: M:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.PropertyMap.Apply(System.String)

summary.vsli:raw: Runs the property translator for the given property, based on the source object's current property value.

member.summary: 根据源对象的当前属性值，为指定属性运行属性转换器。

param.name: propertyName
param.vsli:raw: The name of the property to translate.

exception.vsli:raw: The property given by <paramref name="propertyName" /> does not exist on <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.PropertyMap.SourceObject" />.

member.exception: 给定的属性不存在于 上。

member.name: M:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.PropertyMap.ApplyAll

summary.vsli:raw: Runs the property translator for each mapped property, based on the source object's current property values.

member.summary: 根据源对象的当前属性值，为每个映射的属性运行属性转换器。

member.returns: 如果 存在于属性映射中，则为 ；否则为 。

exception.vsli:raw: The property given by <paramref name="propertyName" /> does not exist on <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.PropertyMap.SourceObject" />.

member.exception: 给定的属性不存在于 上。

member.name: M:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.WndProc(System.IntPtr,System.Int32,System.IntPtr,System.IntPtr,System.Boolean@)

summary.vsli:raw: When implemented in a derived class, accesses the window process of the hosted child window.

member.summary: 在派生类中实现时，访问承载的子窗口的窗口进程。

param.name: hwnd
param.vsli:raw: Window handle of the hosted window.

member.param: 所承载窗口的窗口句柄。

param.name: msg
param.vsli:raw: Message to act upon.

param.name: wParam
param.vsli:raw: Information that may be relevant to handling the message. This is typically used to store small pieces of information, such as flags.

member.param: 可能与处理消息有关的信息。 它通常用于存储小段信息，如标志。

param.name: lParam
param.vsli:raw: Information that may be relevant to handling the message. This is typically used to reference an object.

member.param: 可能与处理消息有关的信息。 它通常用于引用对象。

param.name: handled
param.vsli:raw: Whether events resulting should be marked handled.

member.param: 是否应将所得事件标记为已处理。

returns.vsli:raw: The window handle of the child window.
